define: Use this api to unbind orders from first mile tracking number or binding ID.

error_list.name: firstmile.error
error_list.description: You used a Delivered FM code, please use a new FM code.

error_list.name: firstmile.error
error_list.description: Your predeclared order creation time is later than pick up time, please use a new FM code.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

params:
{"request_params":[{"description":"

The list of order info you want to unbind from the first mile tracking number or binding ID. You can specify up to 50 order_sns in this call.

","name":"order_list","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":"True","key":"zGQmhNQ","children":[{"description":"

Shopee's unique identifier for an order.

","name":"order_sn","sample":"2410215AMTPJ2N","type":"string","required":"True","key":"jisyKfn"},{"description":"

Shopee's unique identifier for the package under an order. You should fill the field with empty string when there isn't a package number.

","name":"package_number","sample":"OFG183183235200317","type":"string","required":"False","key":"cYQyCFi"}]}],"response_params":[{"description":"

Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"error","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"zJPFNXQ"},{"description":"

The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

","name":"binding_id","sample":"DCN240065737910MU","type":"string","required":null,"key":"MGbchmE"},{"description":"

The generated first-mile tracking number, value might be blank.

","name":"first_mile_tracking_number","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"GXbQjPR"}]},{"description":"","name":"fail_list","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":null,"key":"kcJMYBn","children":[{"description":"
